text: Deception is a 1946 American crime drama movie directed by Irving Rapper and is the second adaption of the 1927 play Monsieur Lamberthier. It stars Bette Davis, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains, Benson Fong and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1946 drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Irving Rapper Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Deception (1946 movie)
